definition: to write without lifting one's pen from the paper
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: Can accurately identify the scribbled with pen words, l support the inverted pen inserted.
sentences.chinese: 可以精準地辨認潦草的連筆字，支持倒插筆書寫。

sentences.english: Standard word "big A-League, " with even the pen in the form of dazzling silver.
sentences.chinese: 標準字“大超聯賽”採用連筆的形式，銀色耀眼。
不久以後你學會了連筆。
